questions.question: Can you find me a job in software engineering?
questions.answer: Sure, I can help you with that. Please provide me with more details about your preferences such as location, pay range, and any specific skills or qualifications you have.

questions.question: What are the highest paying jobs?
questions.answer: The highest paying jobs vary depending on factors such as industry, location, and experience. Some high-paying job roles include software engineering, data science, and management positions.
